timeBlocks.title: Morning Flight to Destination
timeBlocks.activity: Board the morning flight to the destination.
timeBlocks.details: Check-in starts at 5:00 AM. Bring your passport and boarding pass.

timeBlocks.title: Buffet Breakfast
timeBlocks.details: Start the day with a hearty meal before departure.

timeBlocks.title: Hotel Check-in
timeBlocks.details: Room is reserved under your name. Ask for a late check-out if needed.

timeBlocks.title: Local Cuisine Lunch
timeBlocks.activity: Try a variety of local dishes.
timeBlocks.details: Reservations are made for 1:00 PM. Ask for the chef's special.

timeBlocks.title: Guided City Tour
timeBlocks.details: Wear comfortable shoes and bring water.

timeBlocks.title: Mountain Zip-lining
timeBlocks.details: Safety gear is provided. Follow the instructor's guidance.

timeBlocks.title: Fine Dining Experience
timeBlocks.details: Reservations are at 7:30 PM. Dress code: Smart casual.

timeBlocks.title: Drive to the Next Stop
timeBlocks.activity: Enjoy a scenic drive along the coast.
timeBlocks.details: Ensure your vehicle is fueled. Drive carefully at night.

timeBlocks.title: Relax and Unwind
timeBlocks.activity: Relax, read a book, or watch a movie.
timeBlocks.details: Prepare for the next day's adventures.
